title: Schoolhouse Lodging
summary: Stay in our lovingly restored village school with private rooms, wood-fired sauna, and hot tub overlooking the Vindel River.
description: Experience authentic Lapland hospitality in our beautifully restored schoolhouse. Located in the heart of Råstrand, our accommodation offers cozy private rooms, traditional wood-fired sauna, and an outdoor hot tub with views of the Vindel River. Enjoy home-cooked meals featuring local ingredients and the warmth of genuine Arctic hospitality.
amenities: Private room with loft and lounge area

itinerary.description: Arrive and settle into your private room. Meet Gustav & Julia.
Enjoy home-cooked dinner featuring local Lapland ingredients.
Relax in the wood-fired sauna and outdoor hot tub under the stars.
Wake up to a hearty Lapland breakfast.
Depart with memories of authentic Arctic hospitality.

seo.title: Schoolhouse Lodging in Lapland | Authentic Arctic Accommodation
seo.description: Stay in our restored schoolhouse in Råstrand, Lapland. Private rooms, sauna, hot tub, and home-cooked meals with authentic Arctic hospitality.

title: Arctic Swim Adventure
summary: An advanced cold water swimming experience in pristine Nordic waters
description: Join our expert guides for an unforgettable Arctic swimming adventure. This experience combines physical challenge with the stunning beauty of Nordic landscapes.

title: Northern Lights Hunt
summary: Witness the magical aurora borealis dancing across the Arctic night sky.
description: Experience one of nature's most spectacular phenomena—the Northern Lights. Our expert guides take you to prime viewing locations away from light pollution, where you'll have the best chance of seeing the aurora borealis. Bring your camera and prepare to be amazed.

itinerary.description: We pick you up and prepare you with warm clothing and hot beverages.
Travel to our prime Northern Lights viewing spot away from light pollution.
Watch the sky and wait for the magical aurora borealis to appear. Our guides provide photography tips.
Return to base with unforgettable memories.

notes: Aurora visibility depends on weather and solar activity. We cannot guarantee aurora sightings, but we maximize your chances.

seo.title: Northern Lights Tours in Lapland | Aurora Hunt
seo.description: Hunt for the magical Northern Lights in Lapland. Expert guides, prime viewing locations, and photography tips included.

title: Dog Sledding Adventure
summary: Drive your own dog sled team through snow-covered wilderness and experience the bond between musher and huskies.
description: Experience the ancient art of dog sledding with our friendly husky teams. You'll learn to handle the sled, command the dogs, and navigate through beautiful winter forests. This is an unforgettable experience that connects you with Lapland's traditional culture.

gallery.caption: Dog sled team ready for adventure

itinerary.description: We pick you up and introduce you to your husky team.
Learn how to handle the sled, command the dogs, and navigate safely.
Drive your own sled team through beautiful winter landscapes for 2-3 hours.
Warm fika (Swedish coffee break) with the dogs before returning to base.

seo.title: Dog Sledding in Lapland | Husky Adventures
seo.description: Experience authentic dog sledding in Lapland with friendly husky teams. Professional instruction and unforgettable Arctic adventure.

title: Ice Plunge Experience
summary: A thrilling introduction to cold water immersion in controlled conditions
description: Experience the invigorating sensation of controlled ice plunge in our specially prepared facilities. Perfect for beginners looking to explore the benefits of cold water therapy.
